Package com.example.qrcodesfornoobs.Adapter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProfileCodeArrayAdapter.RecyclerViewInterface  
    SearchAdapter.RecyclerViewInterface
    An interface to handle click events on the list items.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodeSliderAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying QR code images in a slider view.
    CommentAdapter
    Adapter class for the QR code's comment recycler view Binds the QR code's comment text to the corresponding view holder.
    LeaderboardPlayerAdapter  
    ProfileCodeArrayAdapter
    Adapter class for the profile code recycler view.
    SearchAdapter
    A custom RecyclerView adapter to display a list of search results.
